posts.post_content: I feel like this artwork was done for a very different card. The blast of fire is much bigger than I would expect for 1 damage, and the licid on his head seems very prominent for not being relevant to the card in any way. I bet this was going to be a licid that granted a firebreathing or pinging ability but got changed late in production.
